name: SDL2 Isometric
description:
A demonstration of an isometric game, made in SDL2.

The goal is to move Purple Guy around the world, picking up red boxes, glasses, knives, and cleaning up spills.

Spills require water to clean.

== How to play ==

The game is mouse driven. Click on a tile to make Purple Guy move to it. Items are collected as they are walked over.

The change zones, click on one of the yellow tiles, around the border.

Additionally, the light level of the game can be controlled using the minus and equals keys.

Note: as this is a demo, there is no win state.
